title: LGBT, Lotte Giants Baseball Team
text: Lotte Giants fans staged protest outside Lotte World Tower Jamsil, southern Seoul Wednesday, calling company invest improving Lotte Giants just days Busan club suffered biggest loss KBO history. 50 Lotte Giants fans paid truck parked outside Lotte World Tower Lotte Department Store Jamsil, carrying digital signboard scrolled series messages calling Lotte Group Chairman Shin Dong-bin invest improving club. Slogans “Don’t force Lotte fans cheer incompetent athletes” “Lotte collapses middle Lee Dae-ho’s last dance” appeared screen throughout day. protest comes just three days Giants Sunday suffered single worst loss Korean baseball history, dropping game Kia Tigers 23-0 Sajik Baseball Stadium Busan.
